concept.title: Data Preview
concept.shortdesc: You can preview data to help build or fine-tune a pipeline. When you preview data, the reads records from the origin and passes it through the pipeline. You can examine input and output data for one stage at a time or for a group of stages.

conbody.p: data previewoverviewpreviewing datadata previewWhen you preview data, you can edit the data and pass it through the pipeline, and then examine the results.
You can also refresh the preview to use another set of data from the origin.
